dk.nesos.font
Interface BitmapFont

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitmapFileFont
public interface BitmapFont

Interface for bitmap fonts.

Warning: Very likely to change in the future when unicode support is added.

Author:
ndhb

Method Detail

getBaseCharacter

int getBaseCharacter()
Returns:
the first ascii character in the font.

getBitsPerPixel

byte getBitsPerPixel()
Returns:
number of bits per pixel (a.k.a. colour depth) of the image.

getCellHeight

int getCellHeight()
Returns:
the height in pixels of characters.

getCellWidth

int getCellWidth()
Returns:
the width in pixels of characters.

getCharactersPerRow

int getCharactersPerRow()
Returns:
the number of characters per row in the image.

getCharacterWidths

byte[] getCharacterWidths()
Returns:
horisontal spacing for each characters in the font.

getColumnFactor

float getColumnFactor()
Returns:
the column factor (number of columns in image).

getGLFormat

int getGLFormat()
Returns:
the image format for OpenGL.

getGLInternalFormat

int getGLInternalFormat()
Returns:
the internal format for OpenGL when storing the image.

getHeight

int getHeight()
Returns:
height of the image in pixels.

getImageData

java.nio.ByteBuffer getImageData()
Returns:
the image data from the bff file.

getLastCharacter

int getLastCharacter()
Returns:
the last ascii character in the font

getRowFactor

float getRowFactor()
Returns:
the row factor (number of rows in image).

getWidth

int getWidth()
Returns:
width of the image in pixels.

getLineHeight

float getLineHeight()
Returns:
vertical spacing between lines.
